greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Left inverse of A277012.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
program: (define (A277011 n) (let loop ((s 0) (n n) (r 0) (i 2) (f 1)) (cond ((zero? n) (+ s (* r f))) ((even? n) (loop (+ s (* r f)) (/ n 2) 0 (+ 1 i) (* i f))) (else (loop s (/ (- n 1) 2) (+ 1 r) i f)))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 25 2016
